sentences.sentence: Objective Study on superantigen Pseudomonas aeruginosa exotoxin A (PE) and its relationship with accessory cell (AC).
sentences.translation: 目的研究铜绿假单胞菌外毒素A（PE）的某些抗原性及其与辅助细胞的关系。

sentences.sentence: The toxin may be formed within the pathogen and released when it dies (endotoxin), or secreted through its cell wall (exotoxin).
sentences.translation: 由病原体通过细胞壁向外分泌的毒素为外毒素。

sentences.sentence: Objective in order to isolate and purify an exotoxin of Streptococcus mitis which can cause toxic shock syndrome and investigate its pathogenicity.
sentences.translation: 目的分离与纯化致中毒性休克综合征缓症链球菌外毒素蛋白，并对其致病性进行初步研究。
